title: Name Change
body: I would like to change my name but its taken but wanted to put it like this Rènzo If any chance that you can change my name.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, the NA region does not support special characters like è, therefore it cannot be put into your summoner name.

Our article on Summoner Names can be found [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ) Let me know if you have any questions.
